bibl.title: Letter from Emilie Lawrence Reed to Caroline Latimer, July 16, [1906?]

div1.p: Emilie Lawrence Reed thanks Latimer for a review of Kelly's biography of Walter Reed, and for her work with Kelly on the book.

div1.head: Letter from Emilie Lawrence Reed to Caroline Latimer, July 16, [1906?]
div1.p:
The review in the
evening Post, that you
so kindly sent is must
pleasing.

Oh! could you but
know how my heart
goes out to you & dear
Dr. Kelly in the most
loving gratitude for
sending out to the world
that seems to know
so little concerning
my husband's life &
work the beautiful
tribute that I know
emanated from genuine
admirations.

And I feel that the
gentle loving spirit
that guided me through
life is still near
me and knows all that
is done to comfort me &
in a way unknown but
will bless those who have
been so kind-
